name: Deep Mob Evolution
subtitle: A comprehensive Guide
landing_text: $(dme) adds new ways to acquire loot that normally drops from mobs, the intent is to remove the need for a big laggy mobfarm.$(br2)The mod is a continuation of a rewrite of $(l:https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/deep-mob-learning)DML$(), and add a variety of new features, such as removing machine sidedness and adding redstone control.
